title: Dual-Task Skill Training Course Based on Medical Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and fundamental patient monitoring concepts
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining smartphone-based simulation tools with offline practical training. Measures learning outcomes through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can identify abnormal signals (heart rate fluctuations) during virtual patient monitoring with 90% accuracy within 10 seconds
Learners can reduce cognitive load (SRME score) by 20% after three consecutive practice sessions in a dual-task environment (surgical knot-tying + patient monitoring)
Learners can improve secondary task performance with a signal detection rate (SDR) of 0.6 or higher and a response time (RRT) within 1.5 seconds

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
